div.p: Symphony Factory is an easy-to-use HTML, CSS and JavaScript framework to create websites for the Symphony Network with a unified design. It is freely available for all Symphony Network sites.

Symphony Factory is free to use, free of charge for all Symphony Network sites (MIT style).
It may not be used in contexts other than the Symphony Network.
